com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.advertiser
Class SponsorPayAdvertiserState

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.advertiser.SponsorPayAdvertiserState

public class SponsorPayAdvertiserState
extends java.lang.Object

Persists and retrieves the state of the Advertiser part of the SDK.

Field Detail

PREFERENCES_FILE_NAME

public static final java.lang.String PREFERENCES_FILE_NAME
Shared preferences file name. We store a flag into the shared preferences which is checked on each consecutive invocation of SponsorPayAdvertiser.register(Context), to keep track of whether we have already successfully contacted the Advertiser API.

See Also:
